plot: In an isolated village in pre independence India, 'Subedar' (Naseeruddin Shah), a tax collector, the agent of colonial power, arrives with his band of soldiers and the aura of authority. At the village celebration in his honour he spots a dusky, beautiful, spirited woman Sonbai (Smita Patil), whose husband is away to the city on work. Subedar desires Sonbai who snubs his advances, escapes from his clutches and takes refuge in the local spice factory where she works with other women,
title: Mirch Masala
